thread.title: Malia Obama Wore These $55 Sneakers to the Office
thread.title_full: Malia Obama Wore These $55 Sneakers to the Office

title: Malia Obama Wore These $55 Sneakers to the Office
text:
by Aemilia Madden 
Her father may be the former commander in chief, but Malia Obama is busy carving out a niche for herself in NYC. The 18-year-old has been interning for film producer Harvey Weinstein in NYC , and it seems she's already easing into the comfy-cool style of New York's coolest girls. For her latest look, she tackled the sometimes tricky trend of wearing sneakers to the office—and totally nailed it. 
Malia's simple ensemble consisted of a navy turtleneck sweater tucked into high-waisted black jeans, and she finished the look with a pair of black high-top Converse. The resulting outfit is simple, with just enough polish to feel appropriate for work. Converse have long been go-tos for trendsetters including Alexa Chung, Beyoncé, and Emma Roberts , and thanks to Malia, it's clear the classics won't be going away anytime soon. 
Read on to see what Malia wore to her internship, then shop sneakers for the office! 1 / 6
